title: Become a League client update alpha tester

replies.body: signed up for this like 2 months ago..{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I signed up 3 months ago...still waiting to be accepted...or some form of response.
same...
rip.
Ditto.

Signed up 2 weeks ago and i got accepted the next day XD. I think u need a good history and no reports 2 be accepted. Well good luck and hope all of u guys get accepted (today was my birthday and it was great, even though i celebrated by myself but hey at least i had a great time :P)

probably means you're not getting accepted.
i know someone who signed up on the day and got accepted last month.
Same here, on the day after it was announced...
that lobby chat though
Their might be draft pick normals, but yet OCE isn't getting them. Why is this??
And Rengar still doesn't have a new skin... {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
jst got accepted{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Wish i can get accepted these days:)))i rlly love League though i have just played for 4-5 months and only a silver player.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
just sighed up wonder if I'll get in :-p
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} rip
signed up like now!!
Why has nobody talked about Gnars summoner name being wrong in the chat?

Any dates on when ranked will be available on the alpha client?

Also, will the alpha testers get anything special? I think an icon would be cool. I mean i've already reported a few bugs.
when i signed up the day it was available months ago and still waiting...

plz... for the love of god... don't do this on a crappy PC.Chat blocks every game and crap responsiveness in both champion select chat and actually selecting champions... it will tilt you out your fkning mind so go ahead by all means... but know it won't get better for the leaguers with crap PC's anytime soon. Words cannot describe how tilted and hollow I feel inside{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
i signed up a couple months ago, got accepted already
So lucky...
Whats the incentive? What about a Golden Compass Volibear?
{{champion:79}}
